data:
[{'date': '2025-08-18', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '☆star', 'content': 'البرنامج مليان ايجابيههههه🤍🤍', 'author': 'قطه', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-17', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Meh', 'content': 'Pensé que era una aplicación gratis, son solo mensajes, al menos ofrecer comprar dentro de la app pero te hacen un cuestionario de mil horas al empezar para después decirte que tienes 3 días gratis y que tienes que pagar ahí mismo', 'author': 'GDVRUIZ', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-17', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Thank you', 'content': 'I am really made my mental health better by telling me I mattered every day and other compliments!!', 'author': 'Charcharcharlie8', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-15', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'not free', 'content': 'i love the idea and concept of this app, but the fact that you have to pay is dumb. you shouldn’t have to pay for affirmations when you’re mentally unwell.', 'author': 'belluga_bell', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-14', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '🛡️❤️‍🔥❤️‍🔥❤️‍🔥❤️‍🔥\U0001fabd', 'content': '💋', 'author': 'BioWare’s', 'version': '5.115.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-13', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Can’t go wrong', 'content': 'Self care is so important and this app is a great place to start', 'author': 'Mell0wdy', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-13', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Ezmerelda Talakai Touchet', 'content': 'Bestie in app form', 'author': 'Aaaplie', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-13', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Amazing', 'content': 'This app makes me feel so much better about my self and all the messages just brightens my day', 'author': '-bevy', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-12', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Love but sometimes annoying', 'content': 'I love getting these free positive pop up quotes all day. However what does annoy me is the streak reminders. I don’t want a streak, nor like getting these many reminders to open the app to keep a streak up!', 'author': 'Tresses39', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-12', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I love this app', 'content': 'I’ve been using this app for years and it just keeps getting better. It has affirmations for everything.', 'author': 'Trace5511', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-11', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Love 😍😍', 'content': 'I have nothing bad to say about this app- It’s so perfect', 'author': 'FurgleBear', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-11', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '❤️', 'content': 'I love this App I’ve had it on my phone for a couple of days it really helps me with my anxiety and keeping a positive mindset☺️❤️', 'author': 'Summermarie.', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-10', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'awesomesauce', 'content': 'i love this app so much. little reminders throughout the day goes a long way ! it helps me feel more confident in myself and reminds me there is more to life than negative thoughts and anxiety. i would recommend this to everyone', 'author': 'lainpillz', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-10', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '◡̈⋆ⒽⒶⓅⓅⓎ😊', 'content': 'This app helps me with my anxiety and stress I love the positive quotes thank you for making this app', 'author': '43😊😍', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-09', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Love this app', 'content': 'Every time I feel like doing something bad I get a notification on my phone and I read it out loud and it just makes everything better I don’t know what it is about this app but it’s so addicting it’s like a good type  of drug definitely recommend getting this app 5/5', 'author': 'Icome4u', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-09', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Amazing', 'content': 'It really helped me with my confidence', 'author': '5.stars.all.the.way', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-08', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Idk what happened', 'content': 'I was on the free version, then something popped up to get a year for 17.99, so I had to go update my payment info. When I clicked on the app again though, there was no option to do that sale again. When I tried deleting it, downloading it again, it won’t let me use the free version at all anymore.

So now I have no more positive affirmations on my Home Screen.', 'author': 'Meeshy_Meesh', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-08', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Life Changing', 'content': 'This is an incredible tool to keep you focused on the positive side. It lifts you up and reminds you that you have so much in life. Encourages you to use your gifts to make your life meaningful and to feel loved and supported.', 'author': 'detoursrock', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-08', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Dislike the paying', 'content': 'i love the app but knowing i only have a free trial hurts bc i can’t afford the subscription', 'author': 'Scarlett N💕', 'version': '5.114.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-08', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Meh', 'content': 'Its the same little generic "affirmations" over and over again, and the home screen widget never updates.', 'author': 'Hilari V', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-07', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Love the affirmations and graphics', 'content': 'Love the graphics', 'author': 'Felicia Edith', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-07', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'LANGUAGE SYSTEM', 'content': 'Please improve it cause I want my messages in spanish and it was not updated', 'author': 'Jessicak07', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-07', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Peace', 'content': 'This is a great app. I just downloaded it but I love it so far', 'author': 'ketokrZy', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-07', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'T H E  O F F I C I A L Q U E E N', 'content': 'G R E A T & S O O T H I N G', 'author': 'Bey0330', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-07', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Make it make sense', 'content': 'I genuinely love the daily/hourly affirmations! They tend to come at the right times and the messages are always great! However, if I have the notifications turned on, why in the world am I being prompted to “Tap to keep getting reminders”??? LEAVE IT ALONE. THROW AWAY THE IDEA OF FORCING PEOPLE TO TAP TO KEEP GETTING REMINDERS. Please consider this review and make the changes.', 'author': 'Pr3tty_hippie', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-07', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'AU', 'title': 'Why I hate I am', 'content': 'I just hate it. Like 2 positive words isn’t going to melt my anxiety. DO NOT DOWNLOADDDDDD', 'author': 'Kennio19', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-06', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Good but could use a few updates!', 'content': 'I really like this app so far. But if I could change a few things I would add a section to save your favourite backgrounds so you don’t lose them in the large variety (I love having options just wish I could find my favs easier). I would also make a spot for requests on types of affirmations (I know I could email but I’d rather shoot a quick message). Like I’d love some focusing on self trust but when I search that not much comes up.', 'author': 'mellykenney', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-06', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Jayda', 'content': 'This app is so amazing it literally gives you so much affirmations every single day when you get this app ♥️♥️ the part that I HATE IS THE MESSAGE PART but I hope you like lit whatever your heart desires', 'author': 'Jayde Rae', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-05', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Inspired', 'content': 'I love this app. Every day I go for my dose of positivity.  In a world of negative this app gives me a little bit of positive back ❤️', 'author': 'Inspir❤️d', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-05', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': '🤍', 'content': 'I love it!', 'author': '@wearingmypresent', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-04', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'streak', 'content': 'this is a nice app but the relentless notifications about losing a streak i never even had are obnoxious. i’ve gone into the app several times to try to turn them off but i still get them.', 'author': 'meglie7', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-03', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'wow!', 'content': 'i love it so much 100% helped with my self confidence!', 'author': 'juliette kattengell', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-02', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Great app', 'content': 'I love this app, keeps people like me above water.', 'author': 'Giggidy912', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-02', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Had to pay', 'content': 'Lovely app - but I’m not sure how reasonable it is to pay for positive affirmations…', 'author': 'Cece4632', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-02', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Disappointing', 'content': 'USED to love this app. Had it for years. The self esteem it gave me and the mantras I said all day just from this app. Now it's forcing me to "practice christianity" unless I pay. Sick that you're forcing religion on me from an app that supposed to help. 15 a month for just affirmations is insanity in itself.', 'author': 'OtterGoddess', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-02', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'The best app', 'content': 'Get it all I can say', 'author': 'Qball777', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-08-01', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I love I am', 'content': 'I come across incredible affirmations that fill my soul, and this is truly gratifying. Thank you all of You.', 'author': 'Salvatore ZU', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-31', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Gratitude', 'content': 'Thank you for providing this app.🙏🏼', 'author': 'Potato_22', 'version': '5.113.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-30', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I am,is okay/I love it', 'content': 'So I do not like that the bundle is EXPENSIVE, BUT except that I love that I am is positive are making me(/people that have it) feel good and more self loving and positive about are self', 'author': 'I hate jenny', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-29', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'It helps', 'content': 'It helped me become a better person and make me feel better about myself but I don’t like that you have to pay for more better things but even if you don’t pay it still helped me mentally!', 'author': '🎀💐💞🌸🌺', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-29', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Just bought it!!!!', 'content': 'So far so good', 'author': 'LA9011:11', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-29', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Been using this for years', 'content': 'Love the backgrounds, they even have relaxing sounds that come with them', 'author': 'lizzyy grant', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-29', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Love it', 'content': 'Good app', 'author': 'Tenten555!', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-28', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Amazing', 'content': 'I have such bad depression anxiety and stuff like that and this app is helpin me so much! I really recommend getting it.', 'author': 'Needs more entertainment', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-28', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I Am', 'content': 'I love love love this app !!! You could be having a rough day , and here comes a amazing positive reminder popping up on you phone screen :)', 'author': 'JoyReneeSmith', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-28', 'rating': 2, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Weird', 'content': 'Kinda goofy asks a lot of questions.', 'author': 'melodymyhave', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-27', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I AM', 'content': 'I am grateful for this app and the self growth that I’ve achieved by using it.', 'author': 'Delilaha345', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-27', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I’m a paying customer and this app hasn’t worked for 6 months', 'content': 'This is my first review ever. I really loved this app when it worked. But for the last 6 months I’ve been receiving no notifications on my iPhone 13 mini, running the latest software on both the app and my phone. I’ve contacted technical support about this, provided robust technical details about my device and app, and I have repeatedly been told that it’s a planned fix in a future update. However, there have been about 40-50 app updates since my initial request, and the only notifications I receive are to “Keep my streak alive!” I didn’t want to write this review. But if you’re going to be a paying customer, you should be aware of this. Thanks for reading.', 'author': 'MellowToastCloud', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-26', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Worth it', 'content': 'Great app that helps you love your self more through the day', 'author': 'FatherFullSend', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-25', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'You gotta be kidding...', 'content': "You open the app and are then forced to answer literally dozens of questions. I didn't count but it is something like 40 or 50 questions. Some can be skipped. Others cannot. But when it's all done then the only option is to sign up for a three day free trial. For Pete sake. Close. Delete. See ya.", 'author': 'Chazmon', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-25', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Inconsistent', 'content': 'Here I am and the Streak Reminder hasn’t worked the last 4 days and the last 2 days, not getting any affirmations — yes, I have cleared all my notifications on my home screen as previously suggested. I’m feeling frustrated because I’ve had this app 2 years and until this year, I had virtually no issues. I hope you can fix this quickly because I really do love this app and it is good for me.', 'author': 'Chelevision', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-24', 'rating': 4, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Wish it wouldn’t be paid', 'content': 'Love this app, wish I didn’t have to pay for it!', 'author': 'SO,FTB_A/LL 💛', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-24', 'rating': 3, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'App', 'content': 'The app is good but it takes the question from the beginning to seriously', 'author': 'Sarah1749', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-24', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Amazing Affirmation App!', 'content': 'I feel like this app always send me the things I need to hear for my motivation and self care. They send notifications to come back on the app as well which really helps keep me focused on wanting to hear what they have to say.', 'author': 'Astra Light', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-24', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Amazing', 'content': 'This app you on track', 'author': 'Leo linton', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-24', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I AM', 'content': 'On my road to recovery and this app is helping me stay on track', 'author': 'Teno93', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-23', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'I am', 'content': 'Love it', 'author': 'LolaChikis', 'version': '5.112.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-22', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'GB', 'title': 'Amazing app!', 'content': 'This app really helps me be more productive and have more self confidence! The quotes are REALLY inspiring and helpful! Defffo a 5/5 stars!', 'author': 'Rim Rae Sung', 'version': '5.111.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-22', 'rating': 1, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Will Charge Free at First Then Charge Crazy Money', 'content': 'This is a simple word generator that wants to charge you $70 per year for what an LLM can do free.', 'author': 'Katherina M23', 'version': '5.111.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-22', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Daily pick me ups', 'content': 'I love having these periodic reminders on my phone telling me I am what I say I am', 'author': 'Tornado Kid7', 'version': '5.111.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-22', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'CA', 'title': 'Love these affirmations!', 'content': 'I struggle with anxiety, depression and other things in life and the affirmations that I receive are always bang-on. They are motivating, they help me get through things, bring me back into a positive state of mind. Best investment in my opinion :)', 'author': 'CateMe0w', 'version': '5.111.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-22', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'GB', 'title': 'Excellent App, notifications have stopped', 'content': 'The daily affirmations I receive by notification in this app have been truly life changing for me this year.

Unfortunately the push notifications have stopped recently, with no reason as to why. I have tried to find the solution in notification settings, uninstalled and reinstalled the app but not had any luck. 

Please do advice as I am a huge advocate and ambassador for the app and its benefits now!', 'author': 'IBrook', 'version': '5.111.0'}, {'date': '2025-07-22', 'rating': 5, 'country': 'US', 'title': 'Great for Cultivating Your Own Motivation and Encouragement', 'content': 'Of all the apps out there like this, I find this one to be the most effective. I use it every single day. It’s easy because I love the “streak” concept. I have mine set to spew out little nuggets at me all day long so the app can catch me at any time no matter what kind of mood I maybe in. The only thing I have a problem with is that daily timer thing. Once it disappears, if you’ve tapped a portion of the screen on accident, you can’t get it back. How do I get back to the part of the app that does the daily 15 minute-long training? I accidentally touched my screen and it disappeared before it finished. Plus, I can’t *always* get to it at the originally programmed time. Things come up. Life be life-ing. So why not make a way where I can just find it in the app and do it when I have the time available if I happen to miss my regularly appointed time?', 'author': 'Jendayi781', 'version': '5.111.0'}]
